title: Sinnar Thermal to undergo IBC process as NCLAT vacates stay
description: Sinnar Thermal Power (STPL) is a subsidiary of the listed company RattanIndia Power, one of the largest distressed power producers, which has a 1,350 MW power plant at Nashik in Maharashtra.
